summary: A customized female body meshes for UNP/UNPB users.
descriptionHtml:
[b][color=yellow][size=4]UNPBB - Customized UNP Body[/size][/color][/b]

[b][color=yellow][size=3]Released by Meister aka Neovinci[/size][/color][/b]


This is a female Body meshes pack for UNP family users.

Actually it made for better proportion for my Clothing and Armour mods.
So I didn\'t think about public sharing.
Because not much different from former UNP and UNPB except only breasts shape.

But recently I got messages, some users hope to get this body type.
and there was no reason to hide it from users.


I\'m not a body mod expert. I can\'t make promise or take request about advanced options.
I hope you understand it.
 
I just added small modification. All compliments have to go to dimon99 and Calyps. 
I also thanks to MrTroubleMaker and XP32.


- It based on UNPB and UNP.

- Customized from Calyps\' UNPB meshes.

- Female Body Meshes only. you need former UNP(or compatible) hands and feet meshes.

- Textures are not included. 

- Bikini meshes from Original UNP files.(required UNP Bikini Textures)



- Extract with 7zip tool, and choose one type between \"nude\" and \"bikini\"
  Copy included \"Meshes\" folder and Drop and paste it into your Skyrim \"Data\" folder.

[b][color=yellow][size=3]Change Log[/size][/color][/b]

v1.30/1.35 : TBBP Bounce Shapes and bone weight improved. 
(Nude and Bikini - Breast and Hip / Breast only)

v1.20/1.25 : TBBP Bounce shapes modified. 
(Nude and Bikini - Breast and Hip / Breast only)

 Optional basic Textures.

 Optional Bikini Textures.



v1.10 : TBBP meshes added. Minor change for TBBP Wejght \"0\".




[b][color=yellow][size=3]Requirements before use it[/size][/color][/b]

dimon99\'s original UNP meshes : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709/?

or compatible meshes for hands and feet. 


[b][color=yellow][size=3]Uninstallation[/size][/color][/b]


- Open your directory which this meshes installed. (..\\Skyrim\\Data\\Meshes\\actors\\character\\character assets)

- Delete 2 files.

femalebody_0.nif
femalebody_1.nif

- or overwright new female meshes you want to use.



[b][color=yellow][size=3]Compatible Mod[/size][/color][/b]

[b][color=blue][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/41735/?]Kitten by Neo - Dreamgirl and UNPBB TBBP [/url][/color][/b]


[b][color=yellow][size=3]Credit[/size][/color][/b]


Thanks to 


dimon99 for DIMONIZED UNP female body
(http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709/?)

Calyps for nice UNPB female body. 
MrTroubleMaker and XP32
(MrTroubleMaker Clothing : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20227/?)
(UNPB Redux : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/37900/?)

Radioragae for \"Hair packs of TES IV Oblivion for Female Only\"
(http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18110/?)

Halofarm for very nice pose mods and location mod.
(http://mod.dysintropi.me/)

Hellosanta for nice textures, SG Female Textures Renewal. 
(http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35267/?)

tktk1 for Enhanced Character Edit.
(http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12951/?)

Naver \"Testinghall\" members.

Naver \"Elderscroll7\" members.

Naver \"Escroll\" members.

Blender developers.

Bethesda.

Nvidia.

Nexus friends.

and my model characters.




[b][color=yellow][center]=======================================================================================
=======================================================================================

Feel free to use it for your work and public sharing. No Permission required.
       
                       But don\'t forget, credit and links to original are REQUIRED.
        
                  Anytime It can be hidden by me or Original author\'s request.[/center][/color][/b]
author: Meister aka Neovinci
